name: Heroes Magic War
description:
Heroes Magic War is new turn-based RPG strategy games, kill zombies with 3 epic heroes.
Duel player in epic turn based strategy battles, play epic heroes and magic. Collect heroes, upgrade units and explore new world. Your enemy is one of fantasy world factions: unlimited Dungeon creatures from abandoned caves like mighty dragon, necromancer, mage and Minotaur. You can also fight as a knight in these rpg adventure games.
This is new age of magic, man here is our best features:
- Enter Free Arena for duel enemy, cast epic bounty spells.
- Battle enemies on large map, build and upgrade your empire.
- Defend castles and kingdom and be the best in the world for free.
- You can play with legion minotaur, stronghold, rampart, necropolis or overlord
- The magic of the 4 elements: fire, water, air, earth
- Big maps for each fantasy world, chest after successful challenge
- Find your role in the war and magic, collecting cards, chest and spells might help you in battles with dragon and zombie mage
- Turn based strategy games challenge to build your army for free and by collecting cards you might become the best gremlin
- 3 different campaigns including arena, fighting against legendary powerful black dragons and horde of Minotaur s from the Dungeon, skeletons, bloodthirsty vampires and legion walking dead from the Necropolis, horde
Are you bored of traditional tactical games like Heroes? Do you want to use your turn-based strategy games to tactical war and magic in every battle? Try Heroes and Magic for free!
If you like Heroes or turn-based games about Heroes and Magic will not leave you indifferent.
